alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 11:43PM EST until December 24 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet. * WHERE...Portions of north central and western Maryland and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Pockets of sub freezing temperatures coincident with patches of light rain will create icy surfaces and icy roads in some locations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Since temperatures are not below freezing everywhere, some roads may be wet, and others icy. Be very careful with these changeable conditions. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
